changeYourPassword:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the password change form
**UI Location**: Settings → Password Change form (main heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the password change section of settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Change your password"
currentPassword:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the current password input field
**UI Location**: Settings → Password Change form (input label)
**When Users See This**: When attempting to change their password
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Current password"
newPassword:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the new password input field
**UI Location**: Settings → Password Change form (input label)
**When Users See This**: When entering a new password
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "New password"
confirmNewPassword:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the new password confirmation input field
**UI Location**: Settings → Password Change form (input label)
**When Users See This**: When confirming a new password
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Confirm new password"
warningChangingPassword:
**Functional Purpose**: Warning message about the effect of changing password
**UI Location**: Settings → Password Change form (info paragraph)
**When Users See This**: Before changing their password
**Technical Context**: This text is bolded.
**Current English**: "Warning: Changing your password will sign you out."
youCanThenSignBackIn:
**Functional Purpose**: Instruction following the password change warning
**UI Location**: Settings → Password Change form (info paragraph)
**When Users See This**: Before changing their password
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "You can then sign back in with your new password."
changePassword:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to submit the password change form
**UI Location**: Settings → Password Change form (submit button)
**When Users See This**: When ready to update their password
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Change password"
